description: You get to bike on an easy path, see waterfalls and cross creeks.  At the lake, you can take in the view of several mountains (Bogart, Bogart Tower, Kidd and Sparrowhawk) before continuing onto 2 other lakes or returning back.
directions: From Ribbon Creek parking lot in Kannaskis, follow the path that goes to Ribbon Falls...and at the 3.7km mark, take a right-hand turn onto a new path.  Park Bikes there, and continue on.
title: Memorial Lake
